title: South Jeff Board Denies Petition To Reinstate Bassett
text:
South Jeff Board Denies Petition To Reinstate Bassett   15, 2015 at 7:47   15, 2015 at 7:47 AM EDT 
The South Jefferson board of education Wednesday night denied a petition to reinstate longtime girls' basketball coach Pat Bassett. Instead, the board voted to replace him with Michele Whitley as head varsity coach. Bassett is one of the winningest coaches in Frontier League history and led the South Jefferson girls to two state championships. Bassett took what he described as a leave of absence last year, following a controversy in December 2013 in which he was briefly placed on leave from his coaching duties. The reason for the leave was never disclosed. The school board voted in September not to reinstate Bassett, leaving some athletes devastated .
